name: librechat
description: LibreChat is an open-source alternative to ChatGPT which supports custom models, connectors, and real-time messaging. It offers flexibility to integrate AI chat functionality in a self-hosted or cloud environment.
features: AI Chat Interface: ChatGPT-like experience, Multiple AI models, Custom connectors. Flexible AI chat platform.
Model Support: OpenAI, Anthropic, Local models, Custom endpoints. Connect to any AI provider.
Conversation Management: Chat history, Multi-conversation, Search and organize. Manage AI interactions efficiently.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, API key control, Custom deployment. Run your own AI chat service.
